text: == Events == * First contact between the Byzantine Empire and the Seljuks. * Vatha Pagan Revolt in Hungary – Gerard Sagredo martyred in Budapest. * Pope Gregory VI accused of simony at Council of Sutri – abdicates * Henry III crowned Holy Roman Emperor by Pope Clement II. * March 5, Naser Khosrow begins the seven-year Middle Eastern journey which he would later describe in his book Safarnameh. == Births == * Margaret Atheling, Queen of Scotland; Wife of King Malcolm III of Scotland and second daughter of Edward the Exile (died 1093) * probable date ** Pope Paschal II (died 1118)
